system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Space 6 (force construct + medium range)  
**Supporting Energy:** Time 2 (duration 1 minute)  
**Range:** Medium, 60 ft.  
**Duration:** 1 minute  
**Total Cost:** 8 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Create a Large hand of force at medium range. Can use action to command it: Grapple (opposed Athletics using your Space Mastery), Shove (move target 10 feet), or Interpose (grant target subtract 1 from both defense dice). Hand has HP = Space Potential Ã— 4.  
**Saving Throw:** Athletics vs Space Mastery (if grappling)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = Huge hand (double HP, 1 hour)
